channel.title: black mesa source freeze at loading
channel.description:
Hi! I just downloaded black mesa 2 days ago and i gave up on trying to run it. At first i had black screen and nothing appears i saw a soloution here by typing +map background none it seems to be working for main menu but when i tried to play new game the loading freeze at 5 bars i think, please help me to make it work
P.S:i tried dxlevel 9.0 nothing happens,and i cant acess to options either
P.S2: I have half-life 2 +css + gmod and they are running in full speed and and best graphics settings
